refnamediv.refpurpose: Append element to an array field

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.parameters;
collection_field
The identifier of the field to which the new element has to be inserted.
expression_or_literal
This is the new element that will be inserted into the document field array.

&reftitle.returnvalues;
Returns a CollectionModify object that can be used to execute the command or to add further operations
